entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of thunderstorms late this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 80 gusting to 110 over southern sections early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
